articles.description: Follow live text, BBC coverage, radio commentary, reaction and updates of medals and results from Winter Olympics in Milan-Cortina.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026 LIVE: Day 14 - watch BBC - medals, results, TV stream & updates from Milan-Cortina

articles.description: Bayern Munich boss Vincent Kompany says Jose Mourinho made a "huge mistake" with his "unacceptable" post-match comments after the alleged racial abuse of Real Madrid winger Vinicius Jr.
articles.title: Mourinho made 'unacceptable, huge mistake' - Kompany

articles.description: Speaking for the first time since Manchester United part-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe's claims the UK has been "colonised by immigrants", head coach Michael Carrick says he is "proud of what the club stands for".
articles.title: Michael Carrick 'proud' of Manchester United's equality and diversity

articles.description: New South Wales Police charge four teenagers over the drive-by shooting of former NRL player Matt Utai and the alleged arson attacks targeting his family in Sydney.
articles.title: Four teenagers charged after drive-by shooting of Matt Utai

articles.description: Cameron Menzies says he has come close to "wrapping" up his darts career as the hand injury he suffered punching a drinks table at the PDC World Championship has left him with "no feeling" in the fingers of his right hand.
articles.title: Cameron Menzies 'came close to quitting' darts after table-punching injury

articles.description: Australia depart the T20 World Cup with a thumping, nine-wicket consolation victory over Oman in Pallekele.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Australia depart with thumping win over Oman

articles.description: UK Athletics plead guilty to the corporate manslaughter of UAE Paralympian Abdullah Hayayei who died in 2017 after a metal cage fell on him while training in London.
articles.title: UK Athletics pleads guilty to corporate manslaughter

articles.description: Sources tell BBC Sport that Crystal Palace's board is considering Oliver Glasner's future at the club.
articles.title: Oliver Glasner's Crystal Palace future in serious doubt after poor run of form

articles.description: A new BBC documentary looks at the rise of bare-knuckle boxing as fighter Liam 'Rocky' Rees tells BBC Sport why he loves the adrenaline.
articles.title: How safe is bare-knuckle boxing as it fights for mainstream appeal?

articles.description: Team GB's Gus Kenworthy says he took the death threats he received after he posted a graphic message about the United States' ICE organisation with a pinch of salt.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Gus Kenworthy took death threats over ICE post 'with grain of salt'
